segments.text: Hello , room service . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ordered dinner about forty minutes ago . It hasn ’ t been delivery yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are sorry for the delay , ma ’ am . Could you hold the line , please ? I ’ ll check your order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your order is ready . It ’ s on the way to your room . We ’ re very sorry to have you waiting , Ma ’ am .
segments.speaker: S1
